title: Calories in a Chicken Drumstick
meta_description: Discover calories in a chicken drumstick, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown per drumstick, and preparation tweaks for better choices.
assumptions: Bone-in, skin-on chicken drumstick, roasted without added oil or sauce; average size (~133 g total weight, ~75 g edible meat).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by chicken size, skin removal, cooking method, and seasonings. Check labels or use a tracker for precision.

quick_answer.text: One roasted chicken drumstick provides ~172 kcal and ~18 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Grilled with light oil spray (vs. roasted)

faqs.q: How many calories in a chicken drumstick with skin?
faqs.a: About 172 kcal for one roasted, skin-on drumstick.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a chicken drumstick?
faqs.a: Roughly 18 g protein per average roasted drumstick.
Yes, 0 g carbs per drumstick, making them keto-friendly.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in a chicken drumstick?
faqs.a: Fried adds ~50-100 kcal; grilling or baking keeps it lower than deep-frying.

faqs.q: Calories in skinless vs. skin-on chicken drumstick?
faqs.a: Skinless is ~122 kcal; skin adds about 50 kcal from fat.
